description: A repository class in Kotlin providing an abstraction layer over NoteDao for data operations related to notes, including retrieval, search, upsert, delete, and getById functionalities.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: Repository providing data access methods for notes, encapsulating NoteDao operations.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Returns all notes, with pinned notes ordered first, as LiveData.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Returns search results for the given query as LiveData.

methods.name: upsert
methods.description: Inserts or updates a note based on its id, returning its id.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its id, or null if not found.
